title: Morning Gratitude Ritual
shortDescription: Start your day with gratitude and positive energy
fullDescription: A morning ritual to cultivate gratitude and set positive intentions for the day. This ritual helps in starting your day with mindfulness and appreciation.

ritualSteps.title: Find a Quiet Space
ritualSteps.description: Sit comfortably in a quiet space where you won't be disturbed.
ritualSteps.tips: Choose a spot with natural light if possible

ritualSteps.title: Deep Breathing
ritualSteps.description: Take 5 deep breaths, inhaling through your nose and exhaling through your mouth.

ritualSteps.title: Gratitude Journaling
ritualSteps.description: Write down 3 things you're grateful for today.

ritualSteps.title: Set Daily Intentions
ritualSteps.description: Write down your main intention for the day.

semanticSummary: A morning gratitude ritual to start the day with mindfulness and appreciation.

title: Weekly Connection Check-in
shortDescription: A weekly ritual to check in with your partner and strengthen your connection.
fullDescription: This ritual creates a safe space for partners to share their thoughts, feelings, and appreciation for each other. It helps maintain emotional intimacy and address any concerns before they become issues.

ritualSteps.title: Set the Mood
ritualSteps.description: Choose a comfortable, quiet space where you won't be interrupted.
ritualSteps.tips: Consider lighting a candle or playing soft music

ritualSteps.title: Appreciation Exchange
ritualSteps.description: Take turns sharing three things you appreciate about each other.

ritualSteps.title: Check-in
ritualSteps.description: Share how you're feeling about your relationship and any concerns.

ritualSteps.title: Plan for the Week
ritualSteps.description: Discuss any upcoming events or needs for the coming week.

semanticSummary: A weekly check-in ritual to maintain emotional connection and address relationship needs.

title: Family Game Night
shortDescription: A fun weekly ritual to bond as a family through play.
fullDescription: Dedicated time for family members to connect, have fun, and create positive memories together through games and activities.

ritualSteps.title: Choose Games
ritualSteps.description: As a family, decide which games to play.

ritualSteps.title: Set Up
ritualSteps.description: Gather materials and set up the game space.

ritualSteps.title: Clean Up
ritualSteps.description: Everyone helps clean up the game materials.

semanticSummary: A weekly family game night to strengthen bonds and create joyful memories.
